title: Society for Contemporary Art: Acquisition Selection 2007
short_description: The Society for Contemporary Art (SCA) was founded in 1940 to promote a better understanding and appreciation of the art of our time at the Art Institute of Chicago. Monthly SCA programs provide access to an exciting roster of leading national and international artists, dealers, critics, historians, and curators, as well as visits to distinguished private collections in Chicago and major art centers within the Unites States and abroad.

input: Society for Contemporary Art: Acquisition Selection 2007
